Title: AI Challenger | HEINEKEN: Tapping AI to Become the Best-Connected Brewer
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Ronald den Elzen, Chief Digital & Technology Officer at The HEINEKEN Company shares that the 160-year-old “start-up” is using agentic AI to transform and grow their business. He believes that gen AI goes well beyond transformation, it offers a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

Learn more: https://msft.it/6056SWv6K
